text: employment of undocumented workers prohibited amend rsa to read as follows employment of undocumented workers prohibited no employer may employ any employee without verifying employment eligibility through the system of the united states citizenship and immigration services and obtaining documentation showing the employee s eligibility to work in the united states the employer shall maintain such documentation for the period required by federal law acceptable documentation of eligibility to work in the united states shall include documents required by federal law or supporting documentation that satisfies the requirement of federal law
